column4: Guys , does anybody have any ideas on the matter of fixing the incorrect screen resolution after restart/
duh, it's the file generated by nvidia-settings, no hand editing...
try opening nvidia-settings as root, open terminal and type sudo nvidia-settings....then do ur settings, save to x file and try

you the verry big problem is this little pesky fact. My xorg.conf is fine, but after each restart my screen resolution goes off, when i launch nvidia-settings it says that my resolution is the one before restart, but my resolution is actually not that one
